Address.value: 4800 MONTGOMERY LANE,SUITE 220, BETHESDA, Maryland, 20814, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Gain Therapeutics Inc is a biotechnology company developing novel small molecule therapeutics to treat diseases across, several therapeutics areas, including, lysosomal storage disorders, central nervous system disorders, metabolic disorders and oncology. The company has filed four patent applications for novel small molecule drug candidates that are Structurally Targeted Allosteric Regulators (STARs). The company derives revenues from collaboration and licensing agreements.
